tool_description: The Aeries API is a web-based, REST API system.
title: Aeries

api_list.name: SSO
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aeries.p.rapidapi.com/api/security/SSO/Init/{aeriesusername}/{tempauthtoken}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aeries.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
